import React from "react"; import "./education.scss" export default function education() { const data = [ { id: 1, name: "Dipin Acharya", title: "School Leaving Certificate", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/hat.png", desc: "School Leaving Certificate- Alpha Boarding School(2014) ", }, { id: 2, name: "Dipin Acharya", title: "Higher Secondary School", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/428321/pexels-photo-428321.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/hat.png", desc: "∙+2(Science) – Pokhara Higher Secondary School (2016)", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "Dipin Acharya", title: "Software Engineering", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/3863793/pexels-photo-3863793.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/hat.png", desc: "Gandaki College of Engineering and Science (2020)", }, ]; return (
